text: Are kꞌu ri winaq ri e kojoninaq ri man aꞌj Israel taj, qatzꞌibꞌam bꞌik wuj chike, qabꞌim chike chi rajawaxik man kakitij ta ri tiꞌj ri yoꞌm chkiwach taq tyox ri xa e bꞌanom kumal winaq, man kakitij ta kikꞌ, man kakitij ta ki tiꞌjol awaj e jitzꞌatalik, xuqujeꞌ man kakaꞌn ta mak kukꞌ taq achyabꞌ xuqujeꞌ ixoqibꞌ.
